Name: Constrict
Description:
Choose an enemy. That enemy can't attack this turn.
Rotate a card on your parnter's field.

Name: Strike
Description: Deal 1 damage. If you have played another action with your partner's icon this turn, deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Sideswipe
Description: Deal 3 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Consume
Description:
Forage.
Draw all the cards in your partner's hand.
If you have played another action with your partner's icon this turn, your partner forages.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose between any number of enemies.
